summary: This document consists of email correspondence between Lisa D Hurd and Amanda Kirby regarding financial transactions related to Southern Financial. The emails discuss the posting of shares and mutual funds to an account, indicating the completion of certain financial dealings.

persons.name: Lisa D Hurd
persons.context: Lisa D Hurd is involved in managing financial transactions and communications regarding account postings.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is communicating with Lisa D Hurd about financial matters and requests a call to discuss further.

connections.description: Both individuals are working together on financial transactions and communications within Deutsche Bank.

keyFacts: The shares related to Southern Financial have been received and are to be posted to an account.
A regular money market fund was received via wire the previous day.
The correspondence indicates that the financial dealings with Southern Financial are nearing completion.
